thread.title: Watch Chance the Rapper Perform "How Great" and "All We Got" at 2017 Grammys
thread.title_full: Watch Chance the Rapper Perform "How Great" and "All We Got" at 2017 Grammys

author: Edwin Ortiz
title: Watch Chance the Rapper Perform "How Great" and "All We Got" at 2017 Grammys
text:
0 Chance the Rapper hit the Grammy stage Sunday night to perform a special rendition of "How Great" and "All We Got" with Kirk Franklin and Tamela Mann. Both are standout cuts from his latest mixtape, Coloring Book , and were perfect choices to take viewers to church. 
CHANCE HAS BROUGHT OUT TAMILLA. HE TAKEN US TO CHURCH YALL. pic.twitter.com/UHRmWHDYcq — Megan (@megalishis1) February 13, 2017 It was a big night for Chance, who walked away with three Grammy awards in the categories of Best New Artist, Best Rap Album for Coloring Book , and Best Rap Performance for "No Problem." Drake even texted Chance to congratulate him about scoring the trophy for Best Rap Performance. Fans couldn't get enough of Chance's performance: 
Me watching this Chance performance #GRAMMYs pic.twitter.com/jXZXroMh3w — ms. wiggy (@55mmbae) February 13, 2017 
How great is our God!! I love Chance so much. #GRAMMYs pic.twitter.com/eIyo1gy1qr — Jaylen Mayfield (@jayyy_jermaine) February 13, 2017 
CHANCE COME AW pic.twitter.com/r043bguU7P
